title: Celebration
summaries: The Celebration is a Hardmode post-Golem / post-Moon Lord launcher that fires two rockets at once (but only consumes one unit of rocket) that travel a short distance before exploding. When the rockets detonate, they display patterns and colors similar to fireworks. On the [img:Legacy tModLoader version] Legacy tModLoader version, it has a 11.11*1/9 (11.11%) chance to be dropped by the Moon Lord. On the [img:Desktop version] Desktop version, [img:Console version] Console version, and [img:Mobile version] Mobile version, it is sold by the Party Girl for 80 after defeating Golem, and its successor is the Celebration Mk2, which takes its place as the new launcher-type Moon Lord drop.

The Celebration has a base 4% critical strike chance, similar to most ranged weapons. On the [img:Legacy tModLoader version] Legacy tModLoader version, it has a base 14% critical strike chance opposed to the usual 4%.
